snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s budget doesn’t break the bank on “progressive” agenda items and socks away some money.
abstract: Editorial assesses New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's preliminary proposed budget, which has surprised some fiscal watchdogs with its moderation and caution; contends budget puts de Blasio in a good position heading into challenging negotiations with unions, whose cooperation he will need to make the budget work.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s budget doesn’t break the bank on “progressive” agenda items and socks away some money.

headline.main: A First Stab at a Prudent City Budget
headline.print_headline: A First Stab at a Prudent City Budget
